description: Numbers n such that there is an arrangement of n points in the plane such that no point is on >= n/2 connecting lines.
comments: Counterexamples to a conjecture of Dirac.
references: H. T. Croft, K. J. Falconer and R. K. Guy, Unsolved Problems in Geometry, F12.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 30 2000
